name: Uwe Fahrenkrog-Petersen
description: '''JÃ¶rn-Uwe Fahrenkrog-Petersen''' (born 10 March 1960) is a German keyboard player, producer and composer. He was the keyboardist of the band [[Nena (band)|Nena]] and co-wrote their world famous hit "[[99 Luftballons]]" as well as another great hit entitled "[[Irgendwie, irgendwo, irgendwann]]" (German for somehow, somewhere, sometime).
